UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: In Silico Design of Polycationic Antimicrobial Peptides Active Against Pseudomonas Aeruginosa and Staphylococcus Aureus
Literature.Author: Hincapié O, Giraldo P, Orduz S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=20µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>25µM)
